extension.description: Interfaces with the windows program AmbiBox to switch profiles for ambient lighting. This requires that the free program Ambibox is installed. Download here: http://www.ambibox.ru/en/index.php/Main_Page Detailed instructions: http://www.ambibox.ru/en/index.php/Configuring_XBMC_script Notice: this program will read from the windows registry to check that Ambibox has been installed! In addition, if configured to start Ambibox if not running, it will access the program and start it.
extension.disclaimer: For bugs, requests or general questions visit the AmbiBox thread on the AdaFruit forum.
